verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> my <S%H4405>speech<s%>; And let this be your <S%H8575>consolations<s%>.
Suffer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H1696>me<s%>, and I also will speak; And <S%H310>after<s%> that I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, mock <S%H3932>on<s%>.
As for <S%H7879>me<s%>, is my complaint to <S%H120>man<s%>? And why should <S%H7307>I<s%> not be <S%H7114>impatient<s%>?
480 <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8074>me<s%>, and be astonished, And <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Even when I <S%H2142>remember<s%> I am <S%H926>troubled<s%>, And <S%H6427>horror<s%> taketh hold <S%H270>on<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
Wherefore do the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, Become <S%H6275>old<s%>, <S%H1396>yea<s%>, wax mighty in <S%H2428>power<s%>?
Their <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> with them in their <S%H6440>sight<s%>, And their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Their <S%H1004>houses<s%> are <S%H7965>safe<s%> from <S%H6343>fear<s%>, Neither is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of God upon <S%H433>them<s%>.
Their <S%H7794>bull<s%> <S%H5674>gendereth<s%>, and <S%H1602>faileth<s%> <S%H6510>not<s%>; Their cow <S%H6403>calveth<s%>, and casteth not her <S%H7921>calf<s%>.
They send <S%H7971>forth<s%> their little <S%H5759>ones<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%>, And their <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H7540>dance<s%>.
They <S%H5375>sing<s%> to the <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> and <S%H3658>harp<s%>, And <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H5748>pipe<s%>.
They <S%H3615>spend<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H2896>prosperity<s%>, And in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> they go <S%H2865>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>.
And they <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H2654>us<s%>; For we desire not the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
What is the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3276>him<s%>? And what profit should we <S%H6293>have<s%>, if we pray unto him?
Lo <S%H2898><s%>, their prosperity is not in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>: The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is far from <S%H7368>me<s%>.

How oft is it that the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is put <S%H1846>out<s%>? That their <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> upon <S%H2505>them<s%>? That God distributeth <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> in his <S%H639>anger<s%>?
That they are as <S%H8401>stubble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, And as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that the <S%H5492>storm<s%> carrieth <S%H1589>away<s%>?
Ye <S%H433>say<s%>, God layeth <S%H6845>up<s%> his <S%H205>iniquity<s%> for his <S%H1121>children<s%>. Let him <S%H7999>recompense<s%> it unto <S%H3045>himself<s%>, that he may know it:
Let his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H3589>destruction<s%>, And let him <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>.
For what <S%H2656>careth<s%> he for his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4557>him<s%>, When the number of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is cut <S%H2686>off<s%>?
Shall any <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, Seeing he <S%H8199>judgeth<s%> those that are <S%H7311>high<s%>?
One <S%H4191>dieth<s%> in his <S%H8537>full<s%> <S%H6106>strength<s%>, Being wholly at <S%H7946>ease<s%> and <S%H7961>quiet<s%>:
His <S%H5845>pails<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%>, And the <S%H4221>marrow<s%> of his <S%H6106>bones<s%> is <S%H8248>moistened<s%>.
And another <S%H4191>dieth<s%> in <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of <S%H5315>soul<s%>, And never <S%H398>tasteth<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%>.
They lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H3162>alike<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, And the <S%H7415>worm<s%> covereth <S%H3680>them<s%>.
Behold <S%H3045><s%>, I know your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>, And the <S%H4209>devices<s%> wherewith ye would wrong <S%H2554>me<s%>.
For ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Where is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince<s%>? And where is the <S%H4908>tent<s%> wherein the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4908>dwelt<s%>?
Have ye not <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H1870>wayfaring<s%> <S%H5674>men<s%>? And do ye not <S%H5234>know<s%> their <S%H226>evidences<s%>,
That the <S%H7451>evil<s%> man is <S%H2820>reserved<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H343>calamity<s%>? That they are led <S%H2986>forth<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath<s%>?
Who shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> to his <S%H6440>face<s%>? And who shall <S%H7999>repay<s%> him what he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>?
Yet shall he be <S%H2986>borne<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave<s%>, And men shall keep <S%H8245>watch<s%> over the <S%H1430>tomb<s%>.

The <S%H7263>clods<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall be <S%H4985>sweet<s%> unto <S%H120>him<s%>, And all men shall <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4557>him<s%>, As there were innumerable before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
How then <S%H5162>comfort<s%> ye me in <S%H1892>vain<s%>, Seeing in your <S%H8666>answers<s%> there <S%H7604>remaineth<s%> only <S%H4604>falsehood<s%>?
